snippet: In “Play by Ear,” at the Chocolate Factory, Rob List lets the outside world in as he draws, dances and sings about the marvelous difficulties of art.
abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews debut of Rob List dance piece Play by Ear, performed by List and dancers, at The Chocolate Factory in Long Island City, Queens.
lead_paragraph: In “Play by Ear,” at the Chocolate Factory, Rob List lets the outside world in as he draws, dances and sings about the marvelous difficulties of art.

headline.seo: Rob List’s ‘Play by Ear’ at the Chocolate Factory
headline.main: The Joys of Letting Life Glide Along
headline.print_headline: The Joys of Letting Life Glide Along
